questiontext.text:
The following cross tabulation includes data from 200 individuals for two variables A and B.

——- ——- ——- ——- A = 1 A = 2 A = 3 B = 1 50 36 64 B = 2 20 12 18 ——- ——- ——- ——-

The events A=2 and B=1 are

answer.text: Dependent, because P(A=2 ∪ B=1) ≠ P(A=2) + P(B=1)

feedback.text: Dependent, because P(A=2 ∪ B=1) ≠ P(A=2) + P(B=1): Incorrect

answer.text: Dependent, because P(A=2 | B=1) P(B=1 | A=2)

feedback.text: Dependent, because P(A=2 | B=1) P(B=1 | A=2): Incorrect

answer.text: Independent, because P(A=2 ∩ B=1) = P(A=2) P(B=1)

feedback.text: Independent, because P(A=2 ∩ B=1) = P(A=2) P(B=1): Correct

answer.text: Independent, because P(A=2 ∪ B=1) = P(A=2) + P(B=1) - P(A=2 ∩ B=1)

feedback.text: Independent, because P(A=2 ∪ B=1) = P(A=2) + P(B=1) - P(A=2 ∩ B=1): Incorrect
